UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Potent MERS-CoV Fusion Inhibitory Peptides Identified From HR2 Domain in Spike Protein of Bat Coronavirus HKU4.
Literature.Author: Xia S, Lan Q, Pu J, Wang C, Liu Z, Xu W, Wang Q, Liu H, Jiang S, Lu L

Sequence Information.Target Organism: MERS-CoV(IC50 F=0.38±0.01µM),MERS-CoV PsV(IC50 I=0.34±0.06µM),Cov-Q1020H PsV(IC50 I=0.44±0.1µM),Cov-Q1020R PsV(IC50 I=0.3±0.04µM),Human hepatocellular carcinoma Huh7(no activity data)
